description: Java class representing a pet owner in the Spring PetClinic application, including properties like address, city, telephone, and associated pets, with methods for managing pets and retrieving pet information.

classes.name: Owner
classes.description: Entity class representing a pet owner with personal details and a list of pets.

methods.name: getAddress
methods.description: Returns the address of the owner.

methods.name: setAddress
methods.description: Sets the address of the owner.

methods.name: getCity
methods.description: Returns the city of the owner.

methods.name: setCity
methods.description: Sets the city of the owner.

methods.name: getTelephone
methods.description: Returns the telephone number of the owner.

methods.name: setTelephone
methods.description: Sets the telephone number of the owner.

methods.name: getPets
methods.description: Returns the list of pets owned.

methods.name: addPet
methods.description: Adds a new pet to the owner's pet list if the pet is new.

methods.name: getPet
methods.description: Retrieves a pet by name, case-insensitive, optionally ignoring new pets.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the owner object.

methods.name: addVisit
methods.description: Adds a visit to a pet identified by petId.
